RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 71. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TWO JET broke alertly, allowed the speed to go early, asked along turn, came three wide for the drive, kicked down the dueling leaders late to win going away. FLOWERS APRIORITY broke forwardly but inward to bother a couple of inner rivals, closest to the leader just off the inside, joined that one late in the turn from the outside, dueled through upper and midstretch, proved determined for the second position late while unable to contain the winner. CANT ATTACK ARCH took control after breaking in good order, clear into the turn inside, continued to set the pace into the stretch by a narrow margin, dueled past the furlong marker, also proved no match for the winner late, outkicked for the place. ROARING QUINN void of speed, split foes when beginning a mild advance late turn, continued to improve position through the stretch. SHE'S MY LOUIE V. bothered just after the break, went evenly in lacking a closing response. CALIFORNIA BELLE also bothered just after the start, one paced as well in lacking a closing kick. MY LADY LUNA in mid pack early, cut the corner into the lane, failed to muster a rally. CHERRY STAR last away, void of speed, four wide into the stretch, failed to rally.

ENTRY.NAME: Roaring Quinn
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, split foes late turn, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: My Lady Luna
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, cut corner, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Cherry Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of speed, 4w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: She's My Louie V.
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered just after break, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: California Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: early bother, one paced, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Flowers Apriority
ENTRY.OWNER: Jeansonne Justin Virgadamo Rodney and Bonura Keith
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke forwardly, chased, bid, dueled, determined 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Two Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, settled off leaders,asked 3w turn,kicked down foes

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Attack Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: took control after start, pace, responded, dueled, outkicked 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLACK ACE broke well despite being brushed, pressed early off the inside, dueled into and through the turn in the two path, drew out steadily through the lane while only shown the crop to win in handy fashion. LAST PENALTY fell back to trail after the start, asked along off the inside midway on the turn, four wide upper stretch when roused, closed well to be in time for the place, no threat to the winner. HIGHER NOTE broke out to brush the winner, was straightened to race in mid pack while unhurried, saved ground into the stretch, moved up to be closest to the winner inside the furlong grounds, caught late for the runner up position. GYPSY JACKPOT went one paced behind the pace off the inside, bid for place, not enough late. PINTORA broke on top, set the early pace inside, dueled with the winner inside that one through the turn, gave way in the drive. MEAN DREAMER was finished early, well back. HALO'S SONG off step slow, always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Last Penalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail,asked turn, 4w for drive, in time 2nd,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Halo's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Pintora
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well,early pace inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsy Jackpot
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced behind the speed, bid for 2nd 1/8, flat late

ENTRY.NAME: Higher Note
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, saved ground turn, closest to winner late,caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Black Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush brk, dueled up front a half, shook clear,drew off,handily

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jason Hall, Stephen Baker, BCSThoroughbreds, and David Bra

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, well back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 1M Turf CR: 83. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 8, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since May 8, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HONORARY GUEST a bit reluctant to load, bobbled just at the break, void of speed, began to advance far turn, angled four wide into the lane, challenged on the outside past the furlong marker, proved best in a determined effort. SWEET CHABLIS tracked the leader off the inside, advanced on that one and took over midway on the final turn, narrowly showed the way past the furlong marker as the winner was challenging, drifted out in front of an idling ABSOLUTELY then proved stubborn to the finish. ABSOLUTELY within striking distance off the inside, continued to track the pace through the second turn, came in the two path for the drive, was idling between the top two just inside the furlong grounds when steadied, went evenly to the wire after recovering to comfortably save the show. LAST OF THE NILE back off the pace, continued to lack speed the middle half, angled out to be five wide into the stretch, displayed a modest amount of late interest to improve position, not a threat to the top three. MAGNA COLORS off a step slow, trailed for over a half,fanned six wide into the stretch, also bettered her position without posing a serious threat. CARPE HORSESHOE mid pack, fell back in some traffic to trail late in the final turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. LAYLA'S SONG four wide when forwardly placed through the first turn, tired from those early efforts. DIANNA'S JET broke on top, clear into the first turn, continued to set the pace up the backstretch, stopped when headed by the runner up in the second turn. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE STRETCH RUN AND A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF ABSOLUTELY AGAINST THE RUNNER UP FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE IN MIDSTRETCH, THE RESULT WAS ALLOWED TO STAND. RACE WAS HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Dianna's Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared early, pace, stopped when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Magna Colors
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed, 6w into lane, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Last of the Nile
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 5w into the lane, modest interest

ENTRY.NAME: Honorary Guest
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, bobbled, angled 4w 1/4, bid, determined

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Gary and Mary West Stable, Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Chablis
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked the leader, bid, took over, drifted out, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: Layla's Song
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnson Kenneth W and Woodson Clinton J
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, forward, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Absolutely
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, tracked 2p into lane, idling, std'd 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Carpe Horseshoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, fell back in traffic late 2nd turn,passed tiring rivals

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Louisiana Stallion S. Presented by Coteau Grove Farms EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 106. Stakes Purse 100000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD THAT WERE SIRED BY A STALLION DOMICILED IN LOUISIANA. Free to nominate with $500 to enter and $250 to start. Supplemental nominations of $1500 will be accepted at time of entries which will includ e all fees. $100,000 added and all fees to be divided per the condition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weight: 3 Yr. Olds 120 lbs., Older 125 lbs. Winners of $35,000 twice at one mile or over in 2023 2 lb. penalty., non-winners of $35,000 at one mile or over since April 7, 2023, 3 lbs., such a race in 2023 6 lbs. a race other than maiden, claiming or starter since April 7 9 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest earnings at time of entry in 2022-23. Failure to draw i nto race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANGUM set a soft but pressured pace along the inside, picked the tempo into the far turn, dueled into the lane, headed briefly past the furlong marker, battled back to retake the advantage then held that same rival safe in the final strides to narrowly prevail. FREE LIKE A GIRL pressed the soft fractions outside the winner, engaged that one in the far turn, dueled into the stretch, put a head in front past the furlong, fell back a bit the next sixteenth then was coming again in the final strides to miss. BEHEMAH STAR in the second flight while racing off the inside, raced three wide into the stretch, proved no match for the top two, held sway late to hold the show. BAYOU JAM lacked speed outside, raced four wide through the final turn, dueled for the show late, outfinished. HEZA PICKLE last to leave, trailed most of the way, between foes stretch, not enough for the show spot. DOUBLE ON THE RED forwardly placed along the inside closest to the top two, began to give way second turn, continued to fade down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Double On the Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Behemah Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight off rail, 3w into lane, no match top two, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Mangum
ENTRY.COMMENT: set soft pace inside, responded, duel, headed, battled back

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adcock's Red River Farm, LLC & J. Adcock

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Pickle
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, trailed most of way, not enough show

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Jam
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed outside, 4w 2nd turn, outkicked show

ENTRY.NAME: Free Like a Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J Pomier Chasey Deville and Caroom Jerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressd soft pace, bid, dueled, briefly led,fell back,coming again

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 75. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHICKEN TRUCK void of speed, four wide advance into the lane, challenged on the outside, edged clear late under steady handling. BELLO CREEDO broke well, cleared to the inside to set the pace, firmly rated early backstretch, spurted away when challenged late backstretch, responded once again when challenged turning for home, gave ground grudgingly to the winner, remained well clear of the others. QUIET AS MIDNIGHT fractious in the gate prior to the start, in mid pack early, advanced and lodged a bid between horses with less than four furlongs remaining, fell back off the runner up, tried that one again into the stretch, could not match the top two the final furlong, best of rest. HEY JACKSON in the second flight while racing off the inside, went evenly through the stretch in lacking a significant closing response. BIG BROTHER last away, devoid of any early foot, was four wide out of the final turn, improved position while also not a serious threat. GOROSTIETA'S LOVE back off the pace, moved closer while four wide the middle half, had little left for the drive. ZIPPY TOGA in the main group early off the inside, lodged a middle move three wide to contend into the lane, faltered when the real running began at the head of the stretch. C. F. CONGRESS chased the runner for a half, moved up inside to lodge a bid with just under a half to run, gave way while continuing inside soon after. THIRSTY WIND forwardly placed in the early going, began a steady fade after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet as Midnight
ENTRY.OWNER: PoBoy Racing LLC and Metoyer Rand S
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, mid pack, bid 7/16, again upper, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of speed, 4w into lane, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Jackson
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight off rail, evenly drive in lacking a kick

ENTRY.NAME: Chicken Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w advance into lane, bid, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: C. F. Congress
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for a half, brief bid inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Thirsty Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Gorostieta's Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer 4w middle half, little left drive

ENTRY.NAME: Zippy Toga
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body off the rail, middle move 3w, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Bello Creedo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, cleared early, pace, responded, dueled,clear 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 8, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 8, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DUKE OF BLUE RIDGE back off the early pace outside, made a steady advance to challenge on the outside late in the turn, floated out five wide into the stretch, wore down that rival to be clear at the end. CUSTOM BLUE GRASS closest to the early leader off the inside, got out when showing the way late turn, dueled into and through upper stretch, could not match strides to the wire, clearly second best. ADIEU LE CHAT off the pace and the inside, between foes through the turn, two path for the drive, could do little with the top pair through the lane, clear of the others. NATE'S REVENGE lacked speed outside, four wide through the turn, moved a bit closer in upper stretch then flattened out to finish up evenly. TRAELEE went one paced throughout while saving ground. FLIT N FLOT TIME lacked speed off the rail, improved slightly while never dangerous. COURAGEOUS TIMMY broke back and failed to menace. MAD GOLD prompted the issue for a half along the inside and gave way. LIAM SKYE last to leave, was always outrun. C'MON VE broke on top, quickly cleared to the inside, set the pace four over a half then stopped when headed late in the turn by the top two.

ENTRY.NAME: Liam Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Courageous Timmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Traelee
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced along the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Mad Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted the pace toward the inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Blue Grass
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, bid, got out 1/4,dueled, clearly 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Adieu Le Chat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace and the inside, btwn foes turn, 2p into lane,clr 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Blue Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace,steadily closer turn, floated out 5w 1/4,bid,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Flit N Flot Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, improved slightly, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Nate's Revenge
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w turn, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: C'Mon Ve
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, cleared to inside, pace, stopped when headed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $ 50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACIE DIAMOND close from the start after an alert break, pursued the leader into the turn, took over exiting the bend, drew well clear under steady handling. NODAH in mid pack early toward the inside, roused in the two path late in the bend, saved ground into the lane, switched out with less than a furlong remaining, finished willingly from between horses to annex the place, not a threat to the winner. FORGOTTEN FORTUNE broke through his gate prior to the start, last to leave, continued to lag well back for a half, came widest for the drive, staged a belated rally down the middle of the strip and was going well at the end to be in time for the show. LASSIE MY GIRL within striking distance for three furlongs, lacked a closing punch through the lane. MYSTIC CREED unruly in the post parade, vied early while three wide, shook briefly clear into the turn, dropped inside, gave way when headed by the winner nearing midstretch. CRYSTAL D'ORO was never a threat. LUMINOUS FLIGHT flashed brief speed along the inside and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Luminous Flight
ENTRY.COMMENT: flash brief speed inside and gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Nodah
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, roused late turn 2p, switched out, up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Lassie My Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Gracie Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start, took over, drove well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Forgotten Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate, far back for a half, widest stretch, up late 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Mystic Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early 3w,briefly clear early turn, weakened when headed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: D. S. Shine Young Futurity EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 86. Stakes Purse 70000. FOR ACCREDITED LOUISIANA BRED COLTS & GELDINGS TWO YEARS OLD. Free to nominate and start, $700 to enter. Supplemental nominations of $1,400 will be accepted at time of entries which will include all fees. $70,000 guaranteed to be divided per condition book stake structure payout percentages per field size. Weight: 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden or claiming allowed 3 lbs., Maidens allowed 5 lbs. Preference to horses with the highest earnings at time of entry. Different owner entrie s will have equal draw according to preferences. The second part of same owner entries will have no consideration over a single interest. Failure to draw into race cancels all fees. Trophy to winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EL DINERO ducked in at the start to be tardy away, moved up to mid pack inside, tipped out three wide nearing mid turn, came five wide into the stretch, challenged soon after while widest of the first fight, drew clear under steady handling. DEAL WITH IT DADDY with the early pace between horses, fell back just before four furlongs remained, asked along midway on the turn, improved inside to foes to become prominent into the stretch, bid, could not match strides with the winner late, held the second spot. GOOD AND STOUT broke back, lacked speed while moving out, five to six wide turning into the stretch, widest through the lane, finished up willingly to be getting to the runner up. SONOFASHIP broke sharp, showed the way from the three path up the backstretch, garnered a larger advantage through the turn, appeared relaxed when still showing the way into the stretch then relented when confronted soon after. CAJUN CYCLONE forwardly placed early while widest, four wide through the turn while still within striking distance, had little left for the stretch run. SOUNDS LIKE POWER vied up front along the inside early, began a steady retreat after a quarter. CUNIMBUS pressed the issue early four wide, chased the leader through the turn, gave way in the drive. BOBBY BOY broke back, lacked speed, moved well out, six wide into the lane, ducked to the rail nearing the furlong grounds, was righted and finished up evenly. HYMN FOR CARLOS in the second flight while off the inside, weakened after three furlongs. GUS'S DREAM WORLD was finished early. POUND OUT A DEAL bothered, off slowly, was never close.

ENTRY.NAME: Pound Out a Deal
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered, off slow, never close

ENTRY.NAME: El Dinero
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in brk, moved out early turn, 5w into lane, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Good and Stout
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved out,5-6w into lane, willing, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bobby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, 6w into lane, ducked to rail midstretch, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Sounds Like Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early along the inside, steady retreat after quarter

ENTRY.NAME: Deal With It Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: with early pace, fell back 1/2, asked turn,bid, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sonofaship
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp Staudacher David and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, pace, larger lead turn, relented

ENTRY.NAME: Cunimbus
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the issue early 4w, chased turn,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Gus's Dream World
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Hymn for Carlos
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight off the inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Cyclone
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed four wide, little left stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AGGIE DOCTOR in the second flight four wide and outside up the backstretch, unhurried in idling along through the turn while remaining in the four path, asked into the lane, accelerated upper stretch, took over inside the furlong marker and continued with good energy to the wire to win going away. MARINA broke alertly, cleared early, set the pace, offered little resistance to the winner the final sixteenth, remained clear for the place. APRIORITY GIRL back off the pace well wide, came five wide and outside the winner into the lane when moving closer, flattened out a bit late but managed to be along for the show. SABERFIGHT lacked early foot, shifted out a bit wider, improved position, gaining for the show late. CRYPTO BRAVE chased the runner up for a half off the inside, faltered through the stretch. SPLITTING ACES lacked speed off the rail, angled out exiting the turn, picked off some tiring rivals outside. JUST ANOTHER WIN remained back in lacking a rally. SHO NUFF within striking distance early inside, steadily faded. TALENTS HOT DEAL forwardly placed for three furlongs, backed up through the stretch. BLUE RIDGE ROMANCE last away, trailed throughout in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: Sho Nuff
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Ridge Romance
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Just Another Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in lacking a rally

ENTRY.NAME: Crypto Brave
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased off rail, faltered drive

ENTRY.NAME: Talents Hot Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward for three furlongs, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Splitting Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, passed tiring rivals outside

ENTRY.NAME: Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, cleared early, pace, no match, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Aggie Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, idled turn, asked 4w into lane, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, closer 5w turning for home, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Saberfight
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, improved, gaining show
